title: Sometimes when I leave from a really good game I get an honor
body:
but then I feel bad because I never honored my teammates back for being awesome!  I just leave the endgame lobby immediately to either get into my next game or just do something else and I always feel a bit poignant when I find out a teammate thought I was awesome but I can't say "you're awesome back!"   because I left the lobby too quickly =(.

I'd really like to be able to honor teammates even after I leave the lobby to avoid those situations

EDIT: I forgot to mention that honor givers would be anonymous to avoid "honor trading" but other than that yeah

replies.body: That would be cool, sometimes I also just am so glad the games over I forget to report someone.
